title: Losing IP?
body:
So, I was playing some blind pick today and when the game was finished I took a glance at my IP, and then closed the client. When I opened up the client again however my IP decreased by about 200 than it was before. Here are some screenshots.

http://imgur.com/0Qb3hxb 

This is my ip before I closed the client

http://imgur.com/RkXS5PV 

And this is my ip after

Can someone please tell me what is going on? Thanks :)

replies.body: Thank you! I saw this happening a lot, so I'm glad I know whats causing it :)

It can take a while sometimes for your IP balance to update correctly if you're playing a lot of games in a row or making a lot of IP purchases. When you logged out and signed back on, it forced your client to sync up with our servers which caused your IP value to update with the correct amount.

Just in case, I've gone ahead and synced your account again. The next time you log in you should see the right amount of IP.
